settings.text: Most orders ship within 24 business hours however processing time can take up to 2 business days (excluding weekends and holidays) after receiving your order confirmation email. You will receive another email with tracking information when your order has shipped.

Pay a flat rate of just $6.95 for any order shipped within the contiguous US 48 States. Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, Guam, and other U.S. territories pay $19.95 flat rate.

FREE SHIPPING OFFER: Spend $80+ and get Free Shipping. *Excludes Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, Guam, other U.S. territories and International addresses.

Estimated domestic delivery time is 2-5 days depending on your location.

**Sauna Heaters & Sauna Rooms are excluded from standard shipping rates and promotions.

You can skip the shipping fees with free local pickup at our Marquette, Michigan store. After placing your order and selecting local pickup at checkout, your order will be prepared and ready for pick up within 1 to 4 business days.

We offer worldwide international shipping. At checkout you will be charged a base rate. We will contact you within 24 hours if your order requires more shipping charges than the base rate. You may cancel your order if you do not wish to proceed with the additional charges.

Canada $24.95 Base Rate

Rest of World $39.95 Base Rate

Estimated International delivery time is 2-3 weeks.

**Your order may be subject to import duties and taxes (including VAT), which are incurred once a shipment reaches your destination country. Touch of Finland is not responsible for these charges if they are applied and are your responsibility as the customer.

settings.title: How do I check the status of my order?

settings.text: When your order has shipped, you will receive an email notification from us which will include a tracking number you can use to check its status. Please allow 24 hours for the tracking information to become available.
